alert.note: Alert for Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 08 at 1:01PM EDT until September 08 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PASCO COUNTY... At 101 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Zephyrhills South, or over Zephyrhills, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Zephyrhills West around 110 PM EDT. Zephyrhills around 120 PM EDT. Zephyrhills North around 125 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Zephyrhills Municipal Airport and Richland. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
